title: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt. MemoryStream error
body:
The problem is that the memory stream is closed but it is not disposed from the memory. It is recommended to use Using clause . Try the following code:

Public Function getImgByte() As Byte()    'Convert image to array bytes
    Using  ms2 as New MemoryStream()
        editStudentPicbox.Image.Save(ms2, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg) ' Use appropriate format here
        Return ms2.ToArray()
    End Using   
End Function

Or just add ms2.Dispose() after ms2.Close() but you have to declare ms2 every time in this function.

Dim ms2 as MemoryStream = New MemoryStream()
